title: Global distribution systems : company revenues 2017
summary: This statistic represents data on the global revenue of the walt disney company in the fiscal year 2019 , broken down by operating segments . That year , the walt disney company generated a total revenue of 26.7 billion u.s. dollars with its parks and resorts segment . The company 's second biggest segment was its media networks , which generated revenue of 24.8 billion u.s. dollars in 2019 .
